blocks.content: To access the Enterprise management screen simply navigate via the top menu of the FieldLogs website by selecting 'Enterprise'. This will load the following screen:

You will need to have upgraded your account or have accepted an invitation to join an Enterprise to see the menu item in the header. See 'Upgrading Accounts' in the 'Setting up an Enterprise' section if you have not done so already.
Depending on whether you are creating a new Enterprise or joining an existing Enterprise, you should see some variation of the screen below:
